SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="cf681bd8ed7b4e75bf6a4ac72cb74e3e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hiya there![etc:Wait frame="8"/] The name's [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal08"/]Kingsly[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I run a
flower shop back at home.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cf681bd8ed7b4e75bf6a4ac72cb74e3e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I actually came to this planet to find
rare flowers,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then things took a turn.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cf681bd8ed7b4e75bf6a4ac72cb74e3e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]One second I'm gazing at a glorious bud,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
and the next thing I know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm stranded![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cf681bd8ed7b4e75bf6a4ac72cb74e3e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]So, yeah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've had enough adventure for
the time being.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't think I'll be doing
much more exploring around here.
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="86ad1562db3d4fb89a30512d564ec66c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]It's been intense,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but I can't just give up
completely.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I still wanna leave this planet
more flowery than it was when I got here.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="86ad1562db3d4fb89a30512d564ec66c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]That's where you come in.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You gotta [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]help
me bloom a whole lot of Pikmin flowers[System:Color name="Default"]![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Let's fill this world with blossoms![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="86ad1562db3d4fb89a30512d564ec66c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]What's in it for you?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] do this for
me, and I'll give you my glorious stone
collection.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Whaddaya say?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] We got a deal?
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="404e990107154b6884bf1fa97a7fa4fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]By the way...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]have you noticed you look
a whole lot like me?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's kinda odd.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
But also kinda awesome.
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="53e85c8ee0314e5c925489758baa9969" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you like flowers, don't you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] buddy?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
What am I saying.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Of course you do,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you
glorious fuzzball!
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="dcf22d231fd54f06b01714dcff0c1267" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Listen,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I think you'd be a cutie patootie
with a flower necklace.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] We gotta try it!
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_Leaf_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="81045772bab34263b53375e518f5a31e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_08_Survivor" name="Glad"/]Can I touch the leafy part of your tail?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Please?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Can I?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I gotta!
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_Leaf_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="85276e97efb946e68da5397950f51646" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_08_Survivor" name="Glad"/]Can I sniff the leafy part of your tail?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Please?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Can I?![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I gotta![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Just one sniff!
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="682c7ef9f73948099bdd6f4465da2070" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_08_Survivor" name="Glad02"/]Wow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] thanks a ton![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You bloomed a whole
lotta Pikmin flowers.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="682c7ef9f73948099bdd6f4465da2070" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]They're so beautiful...
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="8b71f96b3b4a4e869311282e126af0b2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_08_Survivor" name="Sad"/]But you can't really be done,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] This
world needs more flowers.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Keep blooming![etc:Wait frame="8"/]
You gotta keep blooming!
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="8ae49c64170f405e9471011f446bfce0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="Area500_08_Survivor" name="Talk"/]Hiya there,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] how's it going?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Are you helping
those Pikmin get their bloom on?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8ae49c64170f405e9471011f446bfce0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]'Cause my stone collection just keeps
getting better![etc:Wait frame="15"/] So you keep up your end
of the dealâ€”get those Pikmin blooming.
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="83ced68610154ace917b6743670b0975" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]As much as I love rare flowers...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I just can't
bring myself to go back out there and
explore.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I know my limits.
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="5f4b62d5c7e4425fb3d5c1990e9ed015" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Pikmin grow flowers when they drink
nectar,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] huh.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5f4b62d5c7e4425fb3d5c1990e9ed015" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Nurturing flowers by sharing nutrients...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Such a heartwarming concept.
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="ae5f21ffadc443c29b853350f1c6d902" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] even if you leave Pikmin
unplucked,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] their sprouts still grow!
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="423f5cfbfa2a4125957955ace4305bea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Don't you think the Glow Pikmin's flowers
remind you of glorious fireworks?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="423f5cfbfa2a4125957955ace4305bea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Sometimes [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] lets us watch footage of
Rescue Corps missions.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="423f5cfbfa2a4125957955ace4305bea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]But I still wish I could see those buds with
my very own eyes.
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="862ee0b236d74bb2816014f79fb71a4c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Glow Pikmin multiply at Lumiknolls,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] which
has me wondering...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]are they closely
related to plants?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="862ee0b236d74bb2816014f79fb71a4c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Does it do the same thing that an Onion
does for Pikmin?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Just a hypothesis.
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="5bd35a8f931945c5beeb6b5250786466" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When you use Ultra-Spicy Spray on Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
they bloom the most glorious flowers.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5bd35a8f931945c5beeb6b5250786466" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]It's just the coolest.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'd love to get my
hands on some.
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="ab63fcbe7b1c428c8a10f67eb8f3bfd6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]A blooming flower is, like,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] proof of a
strong life force that's overflowing
with vital energy.
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="f6cd50828f6945c3ace7f5fe46877d1e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Don't you think the Glow Pikmin's flowers
remind you of glorious fireworks?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f6cd50828f6945c3ace7f5fe46877d1e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Sometimes Collin lets us watch footage of
Rescue Corps missions.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f6cd50828f6945c3ace7f5fe46877d1e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]But I still wish I could see those buds with
my very own eyes.
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="5bbf9cb740e24af2bcc0674ade97dfe8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]The moment a Pellet Posy flowers is just...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
amazing.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yeah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's super amazing.
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="321ff70129e04cc8a4242a5d1607d07e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Not growing flowers is basically a crime
against the planet![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You can't be a florist
and NOT grow flowers!
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="01c1ec2ceee546dba9c031bcce4a22a7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Don't you think the Glow Pikmin's flowers
remind you of glorious fireworks?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="01c1ec2ceee546dba9c031bcce4a22a7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Sometimes Collin lets us watch footage of

SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="385f972a6fa74f45a8a9bdbdc6e7e55e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When you use Ultra-Spicy Spray on Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
they bloom the most glorious flowers.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="385f972a6fa74f45a8a9bdbdc6e7e55e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]It's just the coolest.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'd love to get my
hands on some.
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="44bdccae392b49f4b0469d1f4641212a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Unexplored lands have always fascinated
me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Probably because they gotta be full
of undiscovered flowers!
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="0f27bcd6047a41b492cc32794e5c8904" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Small flowers.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Big flowers.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I just like
flowers.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But the best is when they bloom.
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="1a3837b8df1c4b1b9d7e7c0bc4ae570d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Don't you think the Glow Pikmin's flowers

my very own eyes.
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="55d3ba91f8124bc08cd54f0f60354307" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I'm feeling pretty grateful for all those
Pikmin you helped bloom into flowers.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Yeah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's a good feeling.
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="2d1cd113717a461d8625031fbf247c2c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You gotta keep adding more and more
blooming flowers to this planet.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Because...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]you just gotta!
SV007.SV007_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal05"/][UE:Meta key="10ad5d0f88bd4a29bbb09d5bac41335f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]As much as I love rare flowers...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]I just can't
